Update README.md

General update

* trying out navigation drawer

Create LICENSE
Update LICENSE
Update README.md

Some initial groundwork required for Deck builder

* started building initial UI and plumbing needed for the deck builder
* more card list UI updates/refinement
* added 'neutral' tab, for non-class specific cards

Added deck summary

* Added deck summary placeholder (WIP)
* Refactored class names
* Started integrated EventBus

Improved deck building experience

* Cards currently in deck now show as selected in the deck builder, and
show the current quantity next to the name
* Deck list side bar now shows the number of each card

Improved UI

- Added 'rarity indicators' to indicate card rarity in list view
- Fixed an issue where search would search all the cards instead of the
currently selected class
- General UI improvements and fixes
- Refactored nav drawer, to be resused across all activities

Choose a Class functionality now works

* Users can now choose a class when building a deck
* Experimenting with class specific coloring in the UI
* Added localized string lookup for class names

Changed card list item

* Slightly changed the style of the card list item displayed when
browsing cards
Update README.md
Update README.md

Added groundwork for deck saving

* Database for decks now created when app first starts
* Added a placeholder view for the deck management page

Merge pull request #6 from efarraro/dev

Added groundwork for deck saving

More work towards deck management/viewing

* Added stub activity for viewing a deck
* Fixed a bug where heroes were being included in the card list
* Deck objects should now be created properly after parsing the deck
from a Deckerino data string

More work towards saving/loading decks

* Current version is somewhat unstable, as changes are made to the deck
builder to support proper loading/saving
* Decks finally do save to the database, as cards are added to the deck

More work towards deck editing

* Added sticky headers, to make it easier to sort through cards of a
given mana cost
* Added ViewHolder pattern for better performance when browsing cards
* Added 'edit deck' button when viewing a deck
* Added a creation date for decks

Deck tracking & deck naming

* Deck can now be saved in the deck builder (menu > Edit name reveals
Edit name dialog in a popup)
* Deck builder action bar now shows the number of cards currently in the
deck
* Added Track Deck functionality
* Deck now reports the correct number of cards in the deck

Theme changes, string cleanup

* When creating a deck, the header is appropriately themed based on the
selected class
* Preparing to add ContextActionBar for deck deletion
* Added additional strings
* Minor bug fixes

More progress towards using cab in deck management

* Long pressing on a deck now brings up a (currently, non-functional)
bar to delete the deck.  More work still required here

UI Improvements & polish

* Improved appearance of card quantity in lists
* More consistent style/spacing
* Improved interface for view/track deck
* Fixed bug where searching for cards would sort the cards in the wrong
order
* Added ability to remove decks

More design work

* New design for card list items
* Tabs/appbar themed depending on currently selected class

Deck management list performance

* Fixed performance issue when loading decks from the database
* Added 'you need to add cards to the database' issue

Nav drawer color

* Nav drawer color should now match the selected class
* In card list, stat section is hidden for cards that don't have stats
(eg: non-minions)
* better experience when decks are empty, or no decks have been created

Update README.md

Added screenshots
- added minor clarification/comment
* Bug fixes
* reverting changes from appcompat experiment
* upgraded app to use AppCompat 21
* project structure refactoring

More refactoring (all activities share common base)
Fixed issue where search bar would show soft keyboard on app launch

Minor refactoring/cleanup
Bug fixes
Experimenting with circular/floating action button for 'create deck'

Bug fixes and TODO cleanup

Fixed bad UX where new decks could be accidentally saved, even when no cards had been added
Fixed an issue where returning to Browse would show the wrong color action bar
Various other minor bug fixes
Refactored BaseDrawer 'create deck' code into DeckBuilder

Added graceful loading screen, when starting app for the first time or upgrading the database file
Fixed an issue where the soft keyboard wasn't dismissed after editing a deck name
Fixed an issue where 'Track Deck' didn't have any indicator when tapping a row/card in the list
Added updated JSON resource file for card data
Added back colors for rarity in card name/titles

Fixed a bug related to when the database should be reloaded
'Track Deck' now shows the number of cards remaining, as cards are drawn (tapped) by the player
Started to add a 'share' feature for decks
Updated to use Apache license
Added license info and About section
